value.stringValue: PBO Associate If Budget Details Updated

rules.name: myRule_9
rules.conditionLogic: (1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6) AND 7
rules.label: Multi Email Alert

value.stringValue:
AND( ISBLANK( [Collaboration_Details_by_Institution__c].Collaboration_Opportunity__c.Budget_Leader__c ), NOT( ISBLANK( [Collaboration_Details_by_Institution__c].Collaboration_Opportunity__c.PBO_Associate__c)), OR( OR(
ISCHANGED( [Collaboration_Details_by_Institution__c].Total_Cost_Collaborator_Proposed__c ), ISCHANGED( [Collaboration_Details_by_Institution__c].Cost_per_Year_Collaborator_Proposed__c ), ISCHANGED([Collaboration_Details_by_Institution__c].Total_Cost_Agreed__c ), ISCHANGED([Collaboration_Details_by_Institution__c].Cost_per_Year_Agreed__c ), ISCHANGED( [Collaboration_Details_by_Institution__c].Total_Cost_RGC_Proposed__c ), ISCHANGED( [Collaboration_Details_by_Institution__c].Cost_per_Year_RGC_Proposed__c ) ), AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISBLANK( [Collaboration_Details_by_Institution__c].Total_Cost_Collaborator_Proposed__c ) ), NOT(ISBLANK( [Collaboration_Details_by_Institution__c].Cost_per_Year_Collaborator_Proposed__c )), NOT(ISBLANK([Collaboration_Details_by_Institution__c].Total_Cost_Agreed__c )), NOT(ISBLANK([Collaboration_Details_by_Institution__c].Cost_per_Year_Agreed__c)), NOT(ISBLANK([Collaboration_Details_by_Institution__c].Total_Cost_RGC_Proposed__c )), NOT(ISBLANK([Collaboration_Details_by_Institution__c].Cost_per_Year_RGC_Proposed__c)) ) ) )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_17
formulas.expression:
AND( ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Collaboration_Opportunity__r.Budget_Leader__c} ), NOT( ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Collaboration_Opportunity__r.PBO_Associate__c})), OR( OR(
ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.Total_Cost_Collaborator_Proposed__c} ), ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.Cost_per_Year_Collaborator_Proposed__c} ), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Total_Cost_Agreed__c} ), ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Cost_per_Year_Agreed__c} ), ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.Total_Cost_RGC_Proposed__c} ), ISCHANGED( {!myVariable_current.Cost_per_Year_RGC_Proposed__c} ) ), AND( ISNEW(), NOT(ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Total_Cost_Collaborator_Proposed__c} ) ), NOT(ISBLANK( {!myVariable_current.Cost_per_Year_Collaborator_Proposed__c} )), NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Total_Cost_Agreed__c} )), NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Cost_per_Year_Agreed__c})), NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Total_Cost_RGC_Proposed__c} )), NOT(ISBLANK({!myVariable_current.Cost_per_Year_RGC_Proposed__c})) ) ) )
